original_title: Expert Health Committee to meet on Tuesday; Full report in three weeks
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The expert committee appointed by the Minister of Health to investigate the recent reports of patients who experienced allergic reactions after they were administered with antibiotics at hospitals, will meet on Tuesday (18).
The meeting of the six-member committee will focus on its future course of action.
The report on the matter will be submitted in the next three weeks.
The Minister of Health decided to appoint the expert committee following multiple requests demanding the government to immediately address the collapse in the country's health sector.

The death of two women, including a pregnant mother, at the Peradeniya Teaching Hospital after being administered an anesthetic drug, as well as the death of a 21-year-old girl while being treated for a stomach ailment, led to controversy in recent days.
